results.title: Australian diary. No. 072
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: plywood veneer cut from giant trees is shown being made in a factory near Cairns using local timber; Ravenswood, ghost town with glamour near Townsville, was once a busy mining town but now has a very small population including the young woman who runs the local store and many other services; Manus Island, part of Papua New Guinea is a very important Pacific base for the RAAF.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board

results.title: Australian diary. No. 071
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: ant hills in the north of the continent are a natural mystery; aa flying padre ministers to a congregation spread over a vast area; Fulbright scholars extend their knowledge of Australia and the art of making a humble broom is shown.

results.brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: soft drink bottling has a rhythm of its own; a doll hospital for broken toys; a look at Flinders Naval College and boys learn big game fishing.

results.title: Australian diary. No. 048
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: The following items are featured on this interesting cinemagazine: youngsters from the outback enjoy an ideal holiday; imitation that is intended to flatter; New Zealand trade delegation on Jubilee visit; early training for budding “Jack Tars” and plastic invades fields of ancient Aboriginal art.

results.title: Australian diary. No. 046
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: a stockman shows his skills with whips; a modern liner highlights the progress made in shipping; ingenious machines produce biscuits by the millions and Texan visitors study primary industry in Australia.

results.title: Australian diary. No. 043
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: The following items are featured in this interesting cinemagazine: migrants learn to be Australian citizens; the fine art of trout fishing is diplayed; and a closer look at tennis raquets which will help Australian players win prestigious trophies like the Davis Cup.

results.title: Australian diary. No. 041
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: J. Rosetti of Sydney and his collegues and apprentices demonstrate the stages of making a large stained glass window, an ancient art. A pet rabbit has a tea party as a young Sydney child puts on a tea party for her pets. Cane growing from soil preparation and planting to carting to the mill in the cane growing bely in Queensland and northern NSW is shown.

results.title: Australian diary. No. 040
results.brief_description: A cinemagazine which features the following items: an Australian inventor perfects a novel lawnmower; billiards champion makes the game look easy; and the Junior branch of the Red Cross is featured.

results.title: Australian diary. No. 039
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: A poultry farm at Werribbe Victoria is shown producing eggs by the million. The latest design for a three way hat designed by Australian milliner John Pickworth ius revealed. Baby animlas at Taronga Park Zoo are favourites. The process of reclaiming salt from the sea and a salt refinery in South Australia are shown. Big game fishing - shark and marlin are caught near Sydney.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board

results.title: Australian diary. No. 034
results.creator_credit: Jack S. Allan and Australian National Film Board
results.brief_description: The items featured in this cinemagazine show the harvesting of apples in Tasmania; the manufacture of costume jewellery; the expoert of South Australian crayfish by air to the United States which is earning valuable export dollars; the work of Matron Shaw at the Crown-Street Women’s Hospital; and the parks and gardens of Canberra.
